Toronto’s Most Dependable Cannabis Store

You should treat weed dispensaries in Toronto the same way as your cannabis buds, with love, respect and careful consideration.
If you’ve been to a few of the weed dispensaries around Toronto, you’ll know that the experience can be extremely different from one pot shop to the next.

Toronto Cannabis Authority is committed to focusing local; to provide our Toronto communities with the best possible cannabis experiences. From the moment you step through our doors in person or online, we want you to feel welcome, comfortable and at home.

We do our best to make sure that your questions never go unanswered, and you’ll always find something in stock that you’ll enjoy.

Toronto Cannabis Authority Takes Quality Seriously

legal

We only sell products that are licensed and registered for sale through the Government of Canada. These strict standards guarantee that you’ll never need to worry whether you’re legally allowed to own or consume our products.

safe

Every product we carry is rigorously monitored and tested to ensure the highest quality ingredients and manufacturing standards. Your safety is our top priority, and we won’t carry products that could put you or your loved ones at risk.

reliable

We only work with the top-quality brands across Canada. This means their products are not only made with the finest cannabis, and they’re always consistent. After all, the best cannabis products always start with reliable, reputable brands.
